description.oldValue:
Users can now see their e-signature approvals on mobile devices and take action on them. As a recipient they can view or review them, as a creator they can edit or cancel them.
GA date: June CY2022
description.newValue:
Users
can now see their e-signature approvals on mobile devices and take action on
them. As a recipient they can view or review them, as a creator they can edit
or cancel them.
